an4.173:1.1: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
an4.173:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
an4.173:6.1: “Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci”ti?
an4.173:8.1: “Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci”ti?
an4.173:10.1: “‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano ‘ma hevam, avuso’ti vadesi.
an4.173:10.2: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha natthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.173:10.4: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.173:10.6: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci’ti, iti puttho samano:
an4.173:10.8: Yatha katham pana, avuso, imassa bhasitassa attho datthabbo”ti?
an4.173:11.1: “‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.173:11.2: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha natthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.173:11.3: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha atthi ca natthi ca annam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.173:11.4: ‘Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha nevatthi no natthannam kinci’ti, iti vadam appapancam papanceti.
an4.173:11.5: Yavata, avuso, channam phassayatananam gati tavata papancassa gati;
an4.173:11.6: yavata papancassa gati tavata channam phassayatananam gati.
an4.173:11.7: Channam, avuso, phassayatananam asesaviraganirodha papancanirodho papancavupasamo”ti.
